scripts.start: DEBUG=app* NODE_ENV=homologation PORT=3003 nodemon app --ignore client/ --exec babel-node --presets es2015,stage-2
scripts.startdev: DEBUG=app* NODE_ENV=development PORT=3001 nodemon app --ignore client/ --exec babel-node --presets es2015,stage-2
scripts.pre-build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp package.json build/ && cp .babelrc build/ && cp -r config build/ && cp -r data build/ && cp -r public build/ && cp -r services build/ && cp -r views build/ && cd build/
